almofus.short-desc: A tool designed to help you in the dofus almanax quests
almofus.long-desc: Almofus is a tool designed to help you keep track of the almanax daily quests. With it, you can keep track of which almanax quests you've already completed and which ones you haven't, which also comes in handy when wanting to complete the 1600 quests success of the game!
